entry.title: Monday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers overnight. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h this evening. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Monday 02 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A few showers. High plus 5.
entry.summary: A few showers ending near noon then mainly cloudy. Wet flurries over higher terrain. Snowfall amount 2 cm over higher terrain. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light in the afternoon. High plus 5. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Monday 02 January 2023
